post:
Good morning to all,
IKOULA is looking for bloggers / Youtubers specialized in IT to collaborate with.

For this partnership, we will provide you, free of charge, some products to test among our large product portfolio. In exchange, we will ask you for a counterpart in relation to your preferred domain (blog article, video etc...). 

If you are interested, please contact us by sending a private message on our social networks ( 
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Ikoula "https://twitter.com/Ikoula") ) or an email to community@ikoula.com,
including your blog domain, email address and your requirements in the email.

We will contact you as soon as possible.
We look forward to read your messages.

The IKOULA team,
